Zomato DBM Extractorâ€”an advanced tool tailored for acquiring restaurant and hotel leads effortlessly. With just one click, extract targeted contacts and comprehensive restaurant information directly from Zomato's database, exporting the lead list seamlessly into an Excel file.

Discover targeted contacts & detailed restaurant info in a click:

The Zomato DBM Extractor swiftly generates an abundance of leads, covering various regions across India. This intuitive leads finder extracts essential details such as restaurant names, addresses, phone numbers, websites, reviews, ratings, and more, storing this data securely in the cloud and providing it in an Excel sheet.
